Posts.HTML: Hi, i downloaded the quest engine but when i try to open a .quest file i got this error, someone knows how to solve it?

Posts.EditableText: Looking in my registry, that clsid is for SAPI, the Microsoft Speech API. I know Quest can use it, but I don't know if Quest installs it or assumes it's installed already. Here is one page talking about it: http://www.nextup.com/sapi.html4 What version of Windows is this?
Posts.HTML:

What version of Windows is this?
